definitions.definition: A hard, brittle, inorganic, nonmetallic material, usually made from a material, such as clay, then firing it at a high temperature.
examples: Joan made the dish from ceramic .

definitions.definition: An object made of this material.
examples: Joe had dozens of ceramics in his apartment.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A hard, brittle, inorganic, nonmetallic material, usually made from a material, such as clay, then firing it at a high temperature.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) An object made of this material.
